Description of incident: On April 10, 2018, Grainger as notified by [24]7.ai that [24]7.ai was involved in a cyber incident, during which time, credit card information of those conducting business with certain [24]7.ai clients, including Grainger, may have been accessed. Customers who used guest check out and manually entered credit card information on Grainger.com or its app were potentially affected. Information includes credit card numbers, security codes, card expiration dates, names and addresses.
